backend/main.mo: Main canister actor handling authorization, user profiles, and website testing data generation with IDs and data structures for test cases, bugs, and corner cases.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module computing max IDs across stored website data and updating the actor state to maintain ID continuity.
feature_evidence.json: Report mapping implemented features to associated frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files including pages, hooks, config, and components.
frontend/DEPLOY_MAINNET.md: Guide outlining prerequisites and steps for deploying the app to the Internet Computer mainnet.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_LINKS.md: Auto-generated mainnet deployment links file showing public app URL and canister IDs, currently placeholder content.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme definitions including OKLCH color tokens for light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/domainName.js: Node script that validates and normalizes domain names for IC deployment, including CLI usage and error reporting.
frontend/scripts/publishMainnetAndRecord: Automates IC mainnet deployment, validates app name, deploys via dfx, retrieves canister IDs, and records deployment artifacts.
frontend/scripts/recordDeploymentArtifac: Parses CLI/env args to get canister IDs, resolves IDs via dfx if needed, and generates/updates deployment markdown metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the main React router structure, layouts, and authenticated routes for dashboard, bugs, test cases, and test runs.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Provides the main application layout with navigation, header, footer, and responsive sidebar.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles user authentication via Internet Identity with login/logout button logic.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuth.tsx: Wraps protected pages, showing loading or login prompts when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/SectionPage.tsx: Simple layout component for section pages with title, description, actions, and content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor using user identity, initializing access control and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, loading identities, and handling login states. Includes helpers to create an AuthClient and expose login, clear, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, websites, test cases, and related testing data via an actor API. Automatically manages cache invalidation and loading states.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes. Sets global background, typography, and border defaults.
frontend/src/lib/urlValidation.ts: Validates URLs for correct format and protocol, returning normalized results or descriptive errors. Ensures presence of hostname and basic domain rules.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge. Simplifies conditional Tailwind class composition.
frontend/src/lib/websiteSelection.ts: Manages reading and writing the selected website ID using URL parameters and localStorage. Keeps selection synced with browser state.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Mounts the root component and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/BugDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a specific bug within a selected website, including error states and navigation options. Fetches website data and validates bug existence.
frontend/src/pages/BugListPage.tsx: Shows a list of bugs for the selected website with loading and empty states, providing navigation to bug details. Fetches website data and renders interactive bug cards.
frontend/src/pages/BugUpsertPage.tsx: Form page for adding or editing a bug, loading website data and handling missing website or bug cases.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing stats, recent activity, and quick action buttons with navigation.
frontend/src/pages/TestCaseDetailPage.ts: Displays details for a selected test case with loading and not-found handling and edit/back actions.
frontend/src/pages/TestCaseListPage.tsx: Lists all test cases for the selected website with loading, empty state, and navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/TestCaseUpsertPage.ts: Form page for creating or editing a test case, including loading states and validation for missing website or test case.
frontend/src/pages/TestRunCreatePage.tsx: UI for creating a test run with a name and selected test cases, using mock data and navigation after submission.
frontend/src/pages/TestRunExecutePage.ts: Executes a test run step‑by‑step, records pass/fail results with notes, and navigates on completion using mock data.
frontend/src/pages/TestRunListPage.tsx: Displays a list of test runs with status badges and navigation to run details or creation.
frontend/src/pages/TestRunSummaryPage.ts: Shows completed test run summary including counts, pass rate, and individual test results using mock data.
frontend/src/pages/WebAppTestingPage.tsx: Manages website testing data generation, selection, and CRUD operations for test cases, bugs, and corner cases.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session values.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Type definitions for Vite environment variables accessible via import.meta.env.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending typography, colors, fonts, shadows, keyframes, and container settings with custom theme variables.
project_state.json: Project state metadata listing issues, existing features, new feature requests, and versioning info for ongoing development.
